meanings.definition: The act of repeating a process or procedure.
meanings.sent1: She completed multiple iterations of her artwork to perfect it.
meanings.sent2: The teacher explained that practice and iterations are key to improvement.
meanings.sent3: The robot's iterations of dance moves were both impressive and amusing.
meanings.sent4: His iterations of jokes kept the audience laughing all night.
meanings.sent5: The endless iterations of waves crashing against the shore were mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: A version of a piece of software or hardware that is being developed or has been released.
meanings.sent1: The company released several iterations of the app to fix bugs.
meanings.sent2: The latest iteration of the smartphone includes new features.
meanings.sent3: The robot's iterations of dance moves were both impressive and amusing.
meanings.sent4: The iterations of the software evolved into a user-friendly interface.
meanings.sent5: The constant iterations of the design led to a sleek and modern product.
